title: Annual Property Tax Levies
description: The annual levies on property taxes in a given city

TaxYear.description: The year the levy was applied/collected

LevyName.description: The name of the levy that was applied

Class.description: The classification of the type of industry levied

ClassCode.description: A code representing the classification of industry

TaxableValue.description: The taxable value of the levy

NumberOfProperties.description: The number of properties affected by the levy

Levied.description: The total amount levied in local currency
